mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.price AS price, p.stock AS stock, p.sales AS sales, p.status AS status, m.merchant_name AS merchantName, c.category_name AS categoryName FROM t_product p LEFT JOIN t_merchant m ON p.merchant_id = m.merchant_id LEFT JOIN t_category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
